name: Spotify
title: spotify.com
shortDescription: Spotify is a digital music service that gives you access to millions of songs and podcasts. It is designed for music lovers and podcast enthusiasts who want to enjoy streaming audio content on various devices. Users can explore a vast library, create playlists, and discover new music tailored to their tastes.

aiSuggestedAlternatives.name: Apple Music
aiSuggestedAlternatives.reason: Offers exclusive content and integration with Apple ecosystem

aiSuggestedAlternatives.name: Amazon Music
aiSuggestedAlternatives.reason: Includes features for Amazon Prime members

aiSuggestedAlternatives.name: Deezer
aiSuggestedAlternatives.reason: Available in more countries than Spotify
